1.name: Freaks
1.description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

2.name: Beauty and the Boss
2.description: An executive hires a mousy, plain woman as his secretary so she will not divert him from his work, but she still becomes determined to win his heart.

3.name: A Farewell to Arms
3.description: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

4.name: Union Depot
4.description: Travelers of different and varied backgrounds meet and interact on one night in a metropolitan train station and its environs.

5.name: The Old Dark House
5.description: Seeking shelter from a storm, five travelers are in for a bizarre and terrifying night when they stumble upon the Femm family estate.

6.name: Jewel Robbery
6.description: A gentleman thief charms a Viennese baron's wife and also conducts a daring daylight robbery of a jewellers.

7.name: One Way Passage
7.description: A terminally ill woman and a debonair murderer facing execution meet and fall in love on a trans-Pacific crossing, each without knowing the other's secret.

8.name: The Mummy
8.description: A resurrected Egyptian mummy stalks a beautiful woman he believes to be the reincarnation of his lover and bride.

9.name: Scarface
9.description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

10.name: Tarzan the Ape Man
10.description: A trader and his daughter set off in search of the fabled graveyard of the elephants in deepest Africa, only to encounter a wild man raised by apes.

11.name: White Zombie
11.description: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

12.name: Vampyr
12.description: A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.

13.name: The Most Dangerous Game
13.description: An insane hunter arranges for a ship to be wrecked on an island where he can indulge in some sort of hunting and killing of the passengers.

14.name: Island of Lost Souls
14.description: An obsessed scientist conducts profane experiments in evolution, eventually establishing himself as the self-styled demigod to a race of mutated, half-human abominations.

15.name: The Sign of the Cross
15.description: A Roman soldier becomes torn between his love for a Christian woman and his loyalty to Emperor Nero.

16.name: Grand Hotel
16.description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

17.name: Shanghai Express
17.description: A loose woman rediscovers a former lover during a dangerous train ride to Shanghai.

18.name: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
18.description: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves in the intolerable conditions of a southern chain gang, which later comes back to haunt him.

19.name: Trouble in Paradise
19.description: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.

20.name: Horse Feathers
20.description: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, the new president of Huxley University, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against the rival Darwin University.

21.name: Blonde Venus
21.description: A cabaret singer takes up with a millionaire to pay for her gravely ill husband's operation.

22.name: Doctor X
22.description: A wisecracking New York reporter intrudes on a research scientist's quest to unmask The Moon Killer.

23.name: Red Dust
23.description: The owner of a rubber plantation becomes involved with the new wife of one of his employees.

24.name: Bird of Paradise
24.description: A native girl falls for a visitor to her island, but she's chosen to be sacrificed to the volcano god.

25.name: Murders in the Rue Morgue
25.description: A mad scientist seeks to mingle human blood with that of an ape, and resorts to kidnapping women for his experiments.

26.name: Red-Headed Woman
26.description: Lillian relentlessly attempts to seduce a married man.

27.name: Three on a Match
27.description: Although Vivian Revere is seemingly the most successful of a trio of reunited schoolmates, she throws it away by descending into a life of debauchery and drugs.

28.name: Rain
28.description: A prostitute newly arrived in the South Pacific finds herself at odds with a stern missionary determined to save her soul.

29.name: The Purchase Price
29.description: A torch singer becomes a mail-order bride for a farmer.

30.name: The Animal Kingdom
30.description: Tom Collier has had a great relationship with Daisy, but when he decides to marry, it is not Daisy whom he asks, it is Cecelia. After the marriage, Tom is bored with the social scene and ...                See full summary »

31.name: Love Affair
31.description: Heiress Carol Owen learns to fly from aeronautical engineer Jim Leonard who begins neglecting his work as their affair progresses. Things get complicated when she learns her father died ...                See full summary »

32.name: Number Seventeen
32.description: A gang of thieves gather at a safe house following a robbery, but a detective is on their trail.

33.name: Forbidden
33.description: A librarian takes a cruise and falls for an unobtainable man, a district attorney married to a crippled woman.

34.name: The Mask of Fu Manchu
34.description: Englishmen race to find the tomb of Genghis Khan before the sinister Fu Manchu does.

35.name: A Bill of Divorcement
35.description: A man, Hilary Fairfield returns home after fifteen years in a mental asylum. However, he finds things are not the way they were when he left.

36.name: So Big!
36.description: Following the death of Selena's father, she's offered a job as a teacher in a small town and a new chapter of her life begins.

37.name: Otona no miru ehon - Umarete wa mita keredo
37.description: Two young brothers throw a tantrum when they discover that their father isn't the most important man in his workplace.

38.name: Chandu the Magician
38.description: When delusional madman Roxor kidnaps a scientist in hopes of using his death ray to achieve world dominance, he is opposed by Chandu, a powerful hypnotist and yogi.

39.name: The Bitter Tea of General Yen
39.description: A Chinese warlord and an engaged Christian missionary fall in love.

40.name: Love Me Tonight
40.description: A Parisian tailor finds himself posing as a baron in order to collect a sizeable bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof young princess.

41.name: Smilin' Through
41.description: The adoptive father of a young woman is horrified to learn she plans to marry the son of the man who accidentally killed her aunt years before.

42.name: Downstairs
42.description: An amoral chauffeur seeks to seduce a young bride.

43.name: This Is the Night
43.description: An affair is almost exposed when Claire's husband unexpectedly returns early from Summer Olympics.

44.name: The Impatient Maiden
44.description: A maid's dreams come true - except they are not quite what she expected.

45.name: Devil and the Deep
45.description: Man sets out for revenge after learning of his wife's affair.

46.name: Das blaue Licht
46.description: When the moon is full, young men die attempting to reach the mysterious blue light in the mountains.

47.name: Merrily We Go to Hell
47.description: A drunken newspaperman is rescued from his alcoholic haze by an heiress whose love sobers him up and encourages him to write a play, but he lapses back into dipsomania.

48.name: Night After Night
48.description: A successful ex-boxer opens a high-class speakeasy in what once was the childhood home of a formerly rich society girl.

49.name: The Rich Are Always with Us
49.description: A socialite gets a divorce but can't keep out of her ex-husband's life.

50.name: No Man of Her Own
50.description: A con man on the run from the police falls for a librarian.
